name: Enter the Robogeon (Secret Santa 2022 Jam)
description:
A boy robot gets separated from his girlfriend (also a robot) when she is mysteriously sent to a fortress by evil robot forces. To make both united once more, he must enter the Robogeon and defend himself from rolling robot-balls that appear on its various rooms.

This game is a Secret Santa 2022 entry, and is a clone of the roguelike Enter the Gungeon. Due to time constraints, it's quite a bit bare-bones, although you can get the gist of how the game is supposed to play like from what is there.
